input_doc_title: Home - Cutting & Wear | Supplying downhole tool technology
input_doc_description: We are an international, world-class company supplying downhole tool technology to drilling equipment manufacturers across the world.
input_doc_text:
Home - Cutting & Wear | Supplying downhole tool technology





































































Cutting & Wear | The Hardfacing Specialist




















About
Gallery
News
Downloads
Contact











+44 (0)114 257 8085




sales@cwuk.com













Hardfacing Workshop Supplies







Fishing & Milling Inserts





Equipment





Consumables





Wear Protection Inserts





Composite Rod





Hardfacing System







Downhole Tool Engineering







Research, Design & Development





Hardfacing Services





Complete Manufacturing Services






















We supply downhole tool technology to drilling equipment  manufacturers across the worldAbout Uswatch our video



















Hardfacing Workshop Supplies
We have a proud history of developing new hardfacing products and equipment for our oilfield workshop customers globally.


LEARN MOREWATCH OUR VIDEO







Engineering Services
Our engineering personnel are totally committed to meeting customer expectations in terms of quality and service.


LEARN MOREWATCH OUR VIDEO 





Testimonial 1
“For over a decade, Taylor Oilfield Manufacturing, Inc. has been licensed to perform the QuickTip Process on tools to increase tool life and wear resistance. Cutting and Wear provided the equipment, materials, and training necessary to perform this process adequately. The materials are of highest quality and the kindness of the staff are second to none. We appreciate and look forward to a business relationship for many years ahead.”
 
Ryan D TaylorPurchasing, Sales for Taylor Oilfield Manufacturing, Inc



Testimonial 3
"It looks like artwork. Real craftsmanship"
 
OlavHalliburton, Norway

prevnext



Latest News




 
04th February 2021

Improved Flux Coating






 
01st May 2020

New Website Launch






 
01st May 2020

Cutting & Wear – Covid 19 Update

Analytical in our search for the best understanding of the industries needs and the most up-to-date techniques








Quality



Striving for ‘best-in-class’ products. Professional and dependable partners to our customers








Passion



Driven to inspire all stakeholders towards sustainability of the business through customer focus, caring and committed management and ethical values








Innovation



The ability to create that is both problem solving and visionary

Engineering Services

Testimonial 1
“For over a decade, Taylor Oilfield Manufacturing, Inc. has been licensed to perform the QuickTip Process on tools to increase tool life and wear resistance. Cutting and Wear provided the equipment, materials, and training necessary to perform this process adequately. The materials are of highest quality and the kindness of the staff are second to none. We appreciate and look forward to a business relationship for many years ahead.”
 
Ryan D TaylorPurchasing, Sales for Taylor Oilfield Manufacturing, Inc



Testimonial 3
"It looks like artwork. Real craftsmanship"
 
OlavHalliburton, Norway
